alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; Roseau (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 1:02AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Marshall and Roseau Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 101 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Strathcona, or 25 miles southwest of Roseau, moving northeast at 35 mph. Other strong thunderstorms were located northwest of Badger toward Pinecreek. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Roseau, Warroad, Greenbush, Badger, Springsteel Island, Middle River and Wannaska. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
